app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Smule Karaoke Music Studio
app_description: Sing over 10 million of your favorite songs with music scrolling lyrics! Sing your favorite songs solo have fun creating a duet or group performance with friends collaborate with other singers from around the world or sing alongside recordings of popular music artists! Record with your camera on or off and add professional audio FX to sound amazing and have fun! With millions of karaoke songs to choose from you re sure to find all of the music you love. Use our voice recorder with scrolling music lyrics so you don t miss a beat. Smule is fun for everyone whether you re a beginner or an experienced vocalist! FEATURES Sing over 10 million of your favorite karaoke songs w scrolling lyrics! Karaoke anytime anywhere. Record songs solo in a duet or group a cappella or enjoy other singers performances! Create studio quality audio add vocal FX that make you sound amazing! Host or join a live karaoke party! Our Sing LIVE feature lets you give live audio only performances 24 7 with friends music lovers from around the world! Record songs with your camera off for audio only performances or turn it on get creative with fun video FX filters! Sing side by side in recorded duets with top music artists like Dua Lipa Olivia Rodrigo Charlie Puth Ed Sheeran classic Disney characters more! Save your recordings privately as you practice learn how to sing or share your performances with the Smule community! Record and share music performances on TikTok Instagram Facebook Snapchat Twitter WhatsApp more! Create your own music videos! Use Smule as a music video editor and record audio vocals first then add your own video FX! Freestyle Mode: Record original songs invite others to join you! Join in new Smule challenges contests monthly to win prizes get noticed! Record personalized voice messages for family friends! Practice with an on screen pitch guide original tutorials! Search trending hits sing the lyrics from your favorite part of the song with our Moments feature! LET S MUSIC TOGETHER Choose from pop a cappella R B rock rap hip hop country K Pop musicals more! With new songs added daily you ll find all your favorite songs karaoke hits here. Is your song missing Upload songs trending hits to the Songbook: https: www.smule.com support upload songbook CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC We believe music is about more than just listening it s about creating sharing discovering participating connecting. As the original social network it has the power to break down barriers bring people together. Join our global community sing songs that express who you are. FIND YOUR VOICE All singers can sound great on Smule. Use music FX video filters on Smule Styles to make your performances pop! If you love karaoke like to sing or simply love music then try Smule for free now! SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS Subscribe for unlimited access to our full karaoke song catalog and sing karaoke solos duets group songs and a cappella for the duration of your subscription Subscriptions are weekly monthly and annual Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription You can read our privacy policy at www.smule.com privacy Price are equal to the value that Apple s App Store Matrix determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in USD https: www.smule.com termsofservice
